    • 12 May 2013

    Fake Shark Real Zombie

    I was approached to design and develop the website for freak-pop, post-hardcore, dance-punk, art punk, experimental rock, progressive band Fake Shark Real Zombie’s release of Liar. This WordPress website enabled the group to embed their latest video, promote social media pages, drive traffic to their record on iTunes and merchandise on Simkin Artist Management, and maintain a tour schedule. All of this content was choreographed to respond to any device for the end-user. The people at Light Organ Records were a pleasure to work with. Artwork used in the project was provided by Mike Shantz.

    Checkout fakesharkrealzombie.com
